enumDescriptions: Replaces entire document with obfuscated script
Creates new document with obfuscated script
Copies obfuscated script to the clipboard

clvbrew.encAllStrings.description:
Encrypt all strings
Encrypts all constant strings

clvbrew.encImportantStrings.description:
Encrypt important strings
Encrypts all important strings (ex: 'http', 'https', 'getrawmetatable', etc.)

clvbrew.noControlFlow.description:
No Control Flow
Remove control flow obfuscation (improves performance, degrades security)

clvbrew.debugInfo.description:
Keep debug info
Keep debug information (larger file size, breaks level based enviroment gathering ( ex: getfenv(2) ), better error messages)

clvbrew.noCompressBS.description:
Compress bytecode
Removes compression on bytecode and constant encryption (possibly higher constant security, larger file size)
